headline: 2 Beaten-Down Stocks to Buy on the Dip
summary: Among them are CRISPR Therapeutics (NASDAQ: CRSP) and Merck (NYSE: MRK), two companies that develop innovative medical therapies.  CRISPR Therapeutics' shares are down by 41% over the trailing-12-month period, while Merck's have declined by 22%.  It's not hard to figure out why CRISPR Therapeutics, a gene-editing specialist, isn't performing well.
